list.en: Do you have any rooms available for tonight?
Do you have a single room?
Do you have any rooms available?
How much is the room, please?
What kind of room would you like?
When do you need the room?
How many rooms would you like to book?
How many nights do you want to stay?
Do you want a single room or a double room?
list.cn: 您要单人间还是双人间?

list.en: How long do you intend to stay?
Are you with the company?
I'd like to book a room.
Let me check the booking system.
I will have to take some details from your passport.
list.cn: 我得从您的护照上记下一些详细信息。

list.en: I want a quiet room.
list.cn: 我想要一个安静的房间。

list.en: I'd like to book a room in your hotel.
list.cn: 我想在你们酒店订一个房间。

list.en: I'd like to make a reservation for this weekend.
list.cn: 我想预订这个周末的房间。

list.en: When did you book the room?
Do you have a reservation with us?
Could you fill out the registration, please?
list.cn: 请您填写一下登记表好吗?

list.en: Where can I check in?
list.cn: 我在哪里办理登机手续?

list.en: Where do I sign?
How would you like to settle your Bill?
Do you mind moving three floors up?
Is hot water available anytime?
Please fill in this registration form.
Do you have a bigger room?
list.cn: 你们有大一点的房间吗?

list.en: I'd like to check in.
I'm staying at least a week.
My friend booked a room for me.
list.cn: 我的朋友为我订了一个房间。

list.en: This is your room.
Your baggage will be sent upstairs in a little while.
list.cn: 您的行李一会儿就送到楼上。

list.en: Have an enjoyable stay.
Can I rent a safety deposit box?
list.cn: 我可以租一个保险箱吗?

list.en: Would you like to deposit something?
Could you leave your suitcase at the bell captain's desk?
list.cn: 请把您的手提箱放在行李员服务台好吗?

list.en: Can I deposit valuables here?
list.cn: 我可以在这里存放贵重物品吗?

list.en: Would you please deposit your bag at our check room?
list.cn: 请把您的包存放在我们的寄存处好吗?

list.en: When does the cloakroom close?
I would like to rent a safety box.
I'd like to leave my luggage with you.
list.cn: 我想把行李寄存在你这里。

list.en: I would like to store my luggage.
Please take care of your valuables.
list.cn: 请保管好您的贵重物品。

list.en: Please put your articles in this box and seal it.
list.cn: 请把你的物品放在这个盒子里，然后封好。

list.en: I'm afraid we can't accept perishable goods.
list.cn: 恐怕我们不能接受易腐烂的货物。

list.en: There are safety deposit boxes at the front desk.
This is your claim. Check.
You can leave baggage without the help of a clerk.
list.cn: 你可以在没有职员帮助的情况下寄存行李。

list.en: When would you like me to clean the room?
list.cn: 您要我什么时候打扫房间?

list.en: May I do your room now?
list.cn: 我现在可以打扫您的房间吗?

list.en: Can I make your bed now?
list.cn: 我现在可以给你铺床了吗?

list.en: May I do the turn down service for you now?
list.cn: 我现在可以为您做夜床服务吗?

list.en: Would you like me to tidy up your room now?
list.cn: 您要我现在收拾您的房间吗?

list.en: Housekeeping, may I come in?
list.cn: 客房服务员，我可以进来吗?

list.en: Could you tidy up the bathroom?
Could you come back in two hours?
I will make up your room.
Please bring us a bottle of boiled water.
list.cn: 请给我们拿一瓶开水来。

list.en: Your room is clean now.
You can do it now if you like.
list.cn: 如果你愿意，现在就可以做。

list.en: Have you got any laundry?
Do you have laundry service?
Is this for washing?
Would you send these clothes to the laundry?
list.cn: 你能把这些衣服送到洗衣店吗?

list.en: Is laundry service available?
How much is laundry service?
Would you please fill in the laundry slip?
list.cn: 请填写这张洗衣单好吗?

list.en: Where can I have my laundry back?
list.cn: 我在哪里可以取回洗好的衣服?

list.en: What if there is any laundry damage?
list.cn: 如果有衣物损坏怎么办?

list.en: The laundryman is here to collect clothes.
I'm afraid it's too late for today's laundry.
list.cn: 恐怕今天洗衣服太晚了。

list.en: We have laundry service in the hotel.
I like dry, clean the dress.
list.cn: 我喜欢干的，干净的衣服。

list.en: Is this the maintenance department?
What's the trouble?
Could you replace it with a new one?
I'm sorry, may I have a look at it?
list.cn: 对不起，我可以看一下吗?

list.en: The heater is not working.
The TV in my room doesn't work.
We'll send someone to repair it immediately.
Please wait just a few minutes.
There's something wrong with the air conditioner.
It's working now.
I'll send someone right up to have a check.
list.cn: 我马上派人去检查一下。

list.en: I'll send someone up to help you.
The light burned out in the bathroom.
Any messages for me?
Do I have any messages?
May I take your message? He is not here.
list.cn: 你要留言吗?他不在这儿。

list.en: You have a message note here.
We will inform him when he comes back.
list.cn: 他回来时我们会通知他。

list.en: I'm afraid we can only take simple messages.
list.cn: 恐怕我们只能接受简单的留言。

list.en: A lady left a message for you while you were out.
list.cn: 你不在的时候，一位女士给你留了言。

list.en: Could you read it for me?
There was a phone call for you while you were out.
list.cn: 你出去的时候有个电话找你。

list.en: You had an urgent phone message about half an hour ago.
list.cn: 半小时前你接到一个紧急电话留言。

list.en: What kind of morning call would you like to have?
When would you like me to call you?
list.cn: 您想让我什么时候给您打电话?

list.en: Is that the wake up service?
I wonder if you have the morning call service?
list.cn: 不知道你们有叫早服务吗?

list.en: When do you wish to wake up?
How can I get a wake up call?
list.cn: 我怎样才能得到叫醒服务呢?

list.en: At what time shall we call you?
By phone or by knocking at the door.
Please wake me up tomorrow morning.
Morning will be out very early.
Please wake me up at six am.
A wake up call at seven tomorrow morning, please.
list.cn: 明天早上7点请叫我起床。

list.en: We will call you up by phone.
The pillow cases are stained.
The bathtub is not clean.
There was no toilet paper in the bathroom.
Can you change the room for me? It's too noisy.
list.cn: 你能给我换个房间吗?太吵了。

list.en: I will look into the matter.
I will look into the matter.
I will get you another one.
This Bill is wrong.
There was something wrong with the desk lamp.
The light in this room is too dim.
I'm not very pleased with my room.
list.cn: 我对我的房间不太满意。

list.en: The next door is too noisy.
The toilet doesn't work.
There is no hot water.
Can I settle my Bill now?
Do you accept traveler's checks?
How do you like to pay your Bill?
What is your way of payment, please?
list.cn: 请问你们用什么方式付款?

list.en: I'm ready to check out.
Please show me the charges.
Please show me all the bills I signed.
list.cn: 请把我签过字的账单都给我看看。

list.en: Here is your receipt.
There is a cover charge.
I didn't make any phone call.
Service fee is phone included.
Please take my luggage downstairs.
list.cn: 请把我的行李拿到楼下。
